description: Shopee Open Platform documentation for developers serving Shopee sellers with different ecommerce needs

sections.name: What is Shopee Open Platform?
sections.content: Created to support developers serving Shopee sellers with different ecommerce needs, Shopee Open Platform is your go-to source of Open APIs and services

sections.name: Benefits of using Shopee Open API?
sections.content: Shopee Open API provides sellers with quick and easy access to important shop data for selling on Shopee, includes information for product, order, and campaign management

sections.name: Who can access Shopee Open Platform?
sections.content: Caters to 2 types of developers: software service providers and sellers with software development capabilities

features: Powerful APIs for orders, products, marketing

notes: This appears to be the introduction/landing page of the Shopee Open Platform documentation. It contains general information about the platform rather than specific API endpoint details. The page includes a navigation menu on the left showing various sections like Getting Started, API Best Practices, and specific integration guides.
